item.description:
NEW HAMPSHIRE SERIES:
Mt. Carrigain

EVENT ORGANIZER: Julie Moran. Please contact me here with your thoughts and ideas about this trip: jmmoran {{AT}} nycap.rr.com, Mobile 518-281-5882. FINISH YOUR NH 48 4,000 LIST WITH US!


ESSENTIAL TRIP DETAILS:

When / Where: See above.

Difficulty: 10.0 miles, about 2,625 Feet total vertical climb. At a 1.5 mile / hour pace this is about a 6 1/4-hour hike.

CLICK HERE: Google Maps Trailhead Directions, Distances (link) from the Passaconaway Campground to the trailhead at the Signal Ridge Trailhead on Sawyer River Road, off of U.S. 302 near Notchland, NH.

Campground Departure Time: 8:15 a.m.

Trailhead Meetup Time: 9 a.m.


Mt Carrigain as seen from the north



TRIP SUMMARY / UPDATES (05/10/2010 4 p.m.): This trip is a cross-posted weekend camping event with Hiking Mates CHALLENGE (HMC) and the 4 Seasons Hiking Group and is an event previously canceled due to unforeseen circumstances. The Signal Ridge Trail mostly follows the old access trail to the former Mount Carrigain fire lookout, so grades are moderate. Good views can be obtained from the tower, which has been rebuilt as a viewing platform with less-steep stairs than the original.


A view of Mt Carrigain from the south.



ESSENTIALS TO BRING: Flash light AND head lamp, food / snacks / at least three bottles of water, first aid items, sun screen, bug repellent. Wear multiple layers of synthetic materials for warmth; trekking poles may be helpful gear for this hike.


RESEARCH ESSENTIALS:

TRAIL DESCRIPTIONS AND TRIP REPORTS
Link, Trail Description -- Signal Ridge Trail
Link, Up-To-Date Trail Conditions


INFORMATION LINKS, MT. CARRIGAIN
Link, SummitPost Page
Link, Hike The Whites Page
Link, Appalachian Mountain Club Page
Link, Hike New England Page
Link, Wikipedia Page



NOTE: You are responsible for bringing appropriate gear, supplies, clothing, first aid and lights. You should review topographic maps and trail features carefully; understanding topography of any challenge hike is key to your knowing where you are, where you're going and how to get back.

WEATHER AND OTHER SUDDEN EVENTS CAN CAUSE SUDDEN CHANGES TO OR CANCELLATION OF THIS EVENT. YOU MUST CHECK BACK TO THE MEETUP.COM SITE OFTEN FOR UPDATES.

See you there! Julie.
item.name: NEW HAMPSHIRE SERIES: Mt. Carrigain
